titleStmt.title: A seasonable lecture, or, A most learned oration disburthened from Henry VValker, a most judicious ... iron monger : a late pamphleteere and now, too late or too soone, a double diligent preacher : as it might be delivered in Hatcham barne the thirtieth day of March last stylo novo / taken is short writing by Thorny Ailo ; and now printed in words at length and not in figures.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: for F. Cowles, T. Bates, and T. Banks,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Taylor, the water poet. Cf. Halkett and Laing.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
